name: tumblr - Rainbow theme
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. tumblr style with Rainbow colors. This fixes a lot of things that seem to be missing in the majority of styles for tumblr. All graphics for the style are embedded in the code so there is no need to worry about a bad graphic link in the future.
additional_info:
06-29-2011 - Condensed size. Post/explore fixes.
05-31-2012 - Updated right column to remove tumblr's new blue gradient and right column background changes. Icon bar fix.
